pages.text: The moondrill cannon is necessary to getting your hands on some moonstone rocks and $(l:terramity:valuables/opaline_moonstone)Opaline Moonstone$().$(br2)The moondrill cannon can only be used during midnight, when the moon is directly overhead.

To use the moondrill cannon, you must first make sure it's charged. To charge it, place a battery under, and it'll be consumed and charge the moondrill cannon.$(br2)You'll know it's charged when the cannon glows yellow. All thats left is to give it a redstone signal and watch it fire into the sky.

Once you blast the moon, chunks will fall all over the world nearby where you fired it.$(br2)From there, it's an easter egg hunt to find moonstone and $(l:terramity:valuables/opaline_moonstone)Opaline Moonstone$().
